data.trans_hint: Cậu nên đọc nhiều tài liệu tham khảo hơn nếu muốn giỏi trong lĩnh vực này.
data.en_hint: You should read more reference manuals if you want to be advanced in this realm.
data.content_game_1: You should read more reference manuals if you want to be advanced in this realm.
data.answer_en_hint: You should read more reference manuals if you want to be advanced in this realm.

data.trans_hint: Hãy đọc hưỡng dẫn cài đặt trước khi hỏi.
data.en_hint: Please read the installation manual before ask anything.
data.content_game_1: Please read the installation manual before ask anything.
data.answer_en_hint: Please read the installation manual before ask anything.

data.trans: Kiểm tra bao hàm điều kiện
data.trans_hint: Họ tiến hành kiểm tra bao hàm điều kiện hàng năm.
data.en_hint: They conduct the condition coverage test annually.
data.content_game_1: They conduct the condition coverage test annually.
data.answer_en_hint: They conduct the condition coverage test annually.

data.trans_hint: Lỗi dữ liệu chồng chéo hiện tại cần được giải quyết ngay lập tức.
data.en_hint: The recent data stack overrun needs solving immediately.
data.content_game_1: The recent data stack overrun needs solving immediately.
data.answer_en_hint: The recent data stack overrun needs solving immediately.

data.trans_hint: Họ cài đặt hệ thống này để kiểm tra bảo mật.
data.en_hint: They launched this system for the security test.
data.content_game_1: They launched this system for the security test.
data.answer_en_hint: They launched this system for the security test.

data.trans_hint: Chúng ta chẳng thể làm gì để ngừa lỗi tràn bộ đệm
data.en_hint: We can't do anything to avoid buffer overflow.
data.content_game_1: We can't do anything to avoid buffer overflow.
data.answer_en_hint: We can't do anything to avoid buffer overflow.

data.trans_hint: Tràn heap là một dạng lỗi tràn bộ đệm.
data.en_hint: The heap overrun is a type of buffer overflow.
data.content_game_1: The heap overrun is a type of buffer overflow.
data.answer_en_hint: The heap overrun is a type of buffer overflow.

data.trans: Kiểm tra độ bao phủ mã
data.trans_hint: Anh ấy là chuyên gia trong kiểm tra độ bao phủ mã.
data.en_hint: He is a master in branch coverage testing
data.content_game_1: He is a master in branch coverage testing
data.answer_en_hint: He is a master in branch coverage testing

data.trans: Người gửi tin, người đưa tin
data.trans_hint: Tài liệu được giao bởi một người đưa tin đặc biệt.
data.en_hint: The documents were delivered by special messenger.
data.content_game_1: The documents were delivered by special messenger.
data.answer_en_hint: The documents were delivered by special messenger.

data.trans_hint: Những chuyên gia IT khuyên nên thực hiện kiểm tra khả năng sử dụng thật cẩn thận.
data.en_hint: IT experts recommend to do the usability test carefully.
data.content_game_1: IT experts recommend to do the usability test carefully.
